name: Purgatory: Rising
description:
This is just a demo!  It contains the first level of the full game coming soon!

Purgatory is a 3rd Person Action-RPG inspired by the Souls-Like genre.  The emphasis is on executing sequences of attacks correctly to control the flow of Combat.  

You are a nurse who wakes up in a accursed land and must fight through enemies and hellish beasts to make it out and return back to the land of the living.

During the combat you must time your attacks correctly to make combos and inflict higher damage.

Thank you so much for your time and feedback!
